publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-343# Mr Jamie McGrigor: Scottish Food Fortnight—That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of Scottish Food Fortnight, the first ever national celebration of Scotland’s best regional produce, to take place between 20 September and 5 October 2003 which will highlight the world-class quality of Scottish produce and advertise Scotland as a prime food destination in Western Europe. Supported by: Donald Gorrie*
S2M-343# Scottish Food Fortnight (lodged on 15 September 2003) Robin Harper*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*
S2M-343# Scottish Food Fortnight (lodged on 15 September 2003) David Mundell*, Mr David Davidson*, Fergus Ewing*, Murray Tosh*, Nora Radcliffe*, Christine May*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-343# Scottish Food Fortnight (lodged on 15 September 2003) Mr Jamie Stone*

S2M-343# Mr Jamie McGrigor: Scottish Food Fortnight-That the Parliament congratulates the organisers of Scottish Food Fortnight, the first ever national celebration of Scotland's best regional produce, to take place between 20 September and 5 October 2003 which will highlight the world-class quality of Scottish produce and advertise Scotland as a prime food destination in Western Europe. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Robin Harper, Mr Ted Brocklebank, David Mundell, Mr David Davidson, Fergus Ewing, Murray Tosh, Nora Radcliffe, Christine May, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-343# Scottish Food Fortnight (lodged on 15 September 2003) Christine Grahame*
S2M-343# Scottish Food Fortnight (lodged on 15 September 2003) Mrs Nanette Milne*, Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-343# Scottish Food Fortnight (lodged on 15 September 2003) Dr Jean Turner*
